reviews.productTitle: GHome Smart Dual Dimmer Switch, Space Saving, 2 in 1 Control , WiFi Smart Light Switch Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, Neutral Wire Required, Voice Control, Single-Pole(1 Pack)
reviews.text: I recently installed the GHome Smart Dual Dimmer Switch and I’m really impressed with how well it works. The 2-in-1 control feature is awesome because I can easily adjust the lighting for two different areas with a single switch, which is a huge space-saver in my home. The WiFi connectivity is seamless, and I was able to set it up with my smart home system in no time using the app. The dimming feature is smooth, and it lets me adjust the light intensity just right, whether I want it bright for reading or dim for a cozy atmosphere. I love being able to control the lighting remotely through the app or with voice commands via Alexa or Google Assistant. It’s convenient, especially when I’m in bed or outside and want to turn the lights off without getting up. The switch itself has a sleek, modern design that blends well with my decor, and the installation was straightforward, even for someone who’s not super handy. I also appreciate how responsive it is—there's no lag when I adjust the lights. Overall, the GHome Smart Dual Dimmer Switch has definitely made my home smarter and more efficient. It’s a great option for anyone looking to add smart controls to their lighting system, and I highly recommend it!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2025
reviews.title: works great

reviews.productTitle: GHome Smart Dual Dimmer Switch, Space Saving, 2 in 1 Control , WiFi Smart Light Switch Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, Neutral Wire Required, Voice Control, Single-Pole(1 Pack)
reviews.text: It is a nice dimmer that allows you to put two dimmers into a single switch box position. It seems to work well. I have only had it in operation for about one hour. It works easily with Alexa. However, It is difficult to set up in the Gosund app (have to do this for Alexa control). because the instructions are inaccurate and I have almost given up. There are no flashing lights when it goes into setup mode. I happened to go to the WiFi network list on my phone after doing the reset and found a GOSUND_<MacAddr> network and connected to it and it set up. They should really be clearer that this unit (the SW7) does not have any indication it is in setup mode. This is a documentation issue.

reviews.title: Works well once you get it set up.

reviews.productTitle: GHome Smart Dual Dimmer Switch, Space Saving, 2 in 1 Control , WiFi Smart Light Switch Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, Neutral Wire Required, Voice Control, Single-Pole(1 Pack)
reviews.text: I installed this dual dimmer switch for the kitchen at my daughter’s house. She bought five led recessed lights, three for the kitchen and two over the kitchen sink divided in two separate circuits. So far, we haven’t encountered any issues as mentioned by other reviewers here. For example, one reviewer mentioned that the switch did not include electrical wires. Well, the switch does not have built-in wiring. You insert the circuit wiring from the wall into its corresponding connection in the switch, i.e. G, H, L1, L2, N, and tighten the respective screw. Another reviewer mentioned that they couldn’t figure out how to turn the individual circuits On/Off. Although I didn’t read the included instructions and don’t know how clear they are when it comes to using this feature, it’s very simple to use. One circuit is controlled (turn On/Off) by pressing the upper part of the switch, while the other circuit is controlled by pressing the lower part of the switch. For example, in our case, pressing the upper part of the switch will turn the kitchen main lights On/Off, while pressing the lower part of the switch will do the same for the over the sink lights. As for the reviewer who mentioned about constantly having to reconnect the switch to the app, this could be caused by loose wiring, either within the switch or somewhere within the electrical circuit. One thing my daughter was not too happy about is that as opposed to the manual non-WiFi dimmer this one replaced, the intensity of the lights do not go down far enough for her taste. Other than that, she’s very satisfied with the way the switch operates.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2024
reviews.title: Worked as intended

reviews.productTitle: GHome Smart Dual Dimmer Switch, Space Saving, 2 in 1 Control , WiFi Smart Light Switch Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, Neutral Wire Required, Voice Control, Single-Pole(1 Pack)
reviews.text: I recently upgraded my home lighting system with the GHome Double Dimmer WiFi Switch, and I am thoroughly impressed with its performance and features. This device has significantly enhanced the convenience and ambiance of my home, making it a standout addition to my smart home setup. Installation and Setup Installing the GHome Double Dimmer WiFi Switch was a breeze. The package included clear, step-by-step instructions that made the process simple, even for someone with basic DIY skills. The switch connected to my existing WiFi network without any issues, and the entire setup was completed in about 30 minutes. Design and Functionality The switch boasts a sleek and modern design that blends seamlessly with my home decor. The dual dimmer functionality is fantastic, allowing independent control of two different light sources from a single switch. App Integration and Voice Control The GHome app is intuitive and user-friendly, offering a range of features that enhance the overall user experience. I can easily dim the lights, set schedules, and create lighting scenes directly from my smartphone. Additionally, the switch integrates perfectly with both Alexa and Google Assistant. Voice commands work flawlessly, allowing hands-free control over my lighting setup.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2024
reviews.title: GHome Double Dimmer WiFi Switch has exceeded my expectations

reviews.productTitle: GHome Smart Dual Dimmer Switch, Space Saving, 2 in 1 Control , WiFi Smart Light Switch Compatible with Alexa and Google Home, Neutral Wire Required, Voice Control, Single-Pole(1 Pack)
reviews.text: ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ **Perfect Smart Solution for Modern Homes!** The SPACE-SAVING Dual Dimmer Switch is an absolute game-changer for anyone looking to streamline their home lighting system. This smart switch allows you to control two lights separately with ease, making your home design simple and elegant. The 7-level adjustable brightness is incredibly smooth and intuitive, letting you set the perfect ambiance with just a touch of your finger. One of the standout features is the timer and schedule function, which is a lifesaver for setting up automatic lighting routines. Whether you're home or away, you can have your lights turn on/off according to your personalized schedule. The voice and remote control capabilities through Alexa and Google Home Assistant are fantastic, providing seamless control without the need for a hub or subscription. The ability to manage everything via the app from anywhere is incredibly convenient, especially when traveling. Sharing control with family members is a breeze with the group share feature, and it’s wonderful to create various scenes for different times of the day. Just be sure to check that you have the required Neutral, Live, and Load wires, and remember it’s for single-pole setups only. Overall, this dual dimmer switch is a superb addition to any smart home, offering both functionality and style. Highly recommended!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2024
reviews.title: **Perfect Smart Solution for Modern Homes!**
